subject: Auctions
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After snaring the ball Barry Bonds hit for his last home run of the 2007 season — career homer No. 762 — Jameson Sutton stored it inside his closet. Sutton, a 24-year-old from Boulder, Colo., has since moved the baseball into a safe deposit box. And with Bonds still looking for a place to play this season, Sutton has hired SCP Auctions to run an online auction that starts March 31.
